message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000.  It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it worth the investment.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you.  How about we split the difference and go with $9,500?  That way we both come out ahead.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go as low as $9,200?
Bob, I'm really trying to make this work for both of us. I'm willing to come down to $9,300, but that's my final offer. If you're not interested, I'll have to move on to other potential buyers.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go as low as $9,000?
